item.title: Google Reopens NYC Campus After Brief Bedbug Infestation
item.description: The non-software bugs hit the company weeks after Google reined in its so-called “Work from Anywhere” policy.

item.title: Move Over Chrome: OpenAI Launches Atlas Browser
item.description: OpenAI launches web browser to compete with Google Chrome

item.title: Few Employer Health Plans Cover Ozempic. This Company Can Help
item.description: Weight loss drugs are in high demand, but most employers can’t shoulder the cost as health care rates skyrocket.

item.title: The Penny Shortage Is Adding Up Frustration Among Small Retailers
item.description: A February presidential order halting the minting of pennies has caused a premature scarcity of the copper coins.

item.title: Why Gen-Z Is Turning to TikTok for Their Benefits Info
item.description: Millennial and Gen-Z workers grew up online, so perhaps it’s no surprise they’re relying on unusual sources for work-related facts.
